QuestData.Title: Stag Mastery
QuestData.Description: I always was a fan of a good stag hunt. Stags are tough, fast, and territorial.$b$bThey may be plant eaters but they can give any hunter a run for his money.$b$bEast of here is a whole mess of Wilderland Stags just waiting for a hunter like yourself to give 'em a good run.$b$bHappy hunting.
QuestData.RewardText: I haven't seen stag hunting this good since Ashenvale.
